## rgb2hex() function

Convert RGB color (e.g. 255, 255, 255) to HEX number

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function rgb2hex(r: number, g: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  r | number | red (0-255) |
|  g | number | green (0-255) |
|  b | number | blue (0-255) |

**Returns:**

number
